casebody.data:
Eda Hofstead CABANISS, James and Kalen Haun, and Elizabeth Wanders, Trustee, Individually and Derivatively on Behalf of the D.B. Alex. Brown Exchange Fund I, L.P.
v.
DEUTSCHE BANK SECURITIES, INC. d/b/a Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown, Alex. Brown Management Services, Inc., DC Investment Partners, LLC, and D.B. Alex. Brown Exchange Fund, I, L.P. No. 369P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Daniel R. Taylor, Jr., David C. Smith, Adam H. Charnes, Tonya R. Deem, Winston-Salem, for Eda Cabaniss, et al. William K. Davis, Alan M. Ruley, Michael D. Phillips, for Deutsche Bank Securities, et al. Mack Sperling, Greensboro, Paul A. Alexis, Nashville, TN, for DC Investment Partners, LLC. J. Donald Cowan, Jr., Greensboro, William J.F. Roll, III, Kevin T. Rover, Marilyn B. Ampolsk, New York, NY, for D.B. Alex. Brown Exchange Fund.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiffs on the 7th day of September 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of October 2005."
